summary: Ok guys, so I had a day off of work and so I made my own V in the Sims 4. I had to make some custom pieces (just the surface...
caption:
Ok guys, so I had a day off of work and so I made my own V in the Sims 4. I had to make some custom pieces (just the surface wires on his face and arms). All the other stuff is stuff that I had downloaded ages ago. 

Remember how The Sims 4 released ‘Create a Sim’ before the full game release? That was cool, if only CDPR would do the same lol

summary: You know what would be really cool? If your companions in Cyberpunk 2077 have daily routines! They have a life to live too...
body:
You know what would be really cool? If your companions in Cyberpunk 2077 have daily routines! They have a life to live too y’know, they can’t hand out with V all the time. You can chat with them and get a line of dialogue and that’s it. They continue with their day.

That would be neat.

Let me shadow Jackie and watch him rip a guys eye out!

summary:
My best friend spent £70 on the preorder for this game.
This whole time he was giving me shit for liking Cyberpunk 2077, saying...
body:
My best friend spent £70 on the preorder for this game.

This whole time he was giving me shit for liking Cyberpunk 2077, saying it’ll be bad, it doesn’t look good, it won’t be a good game.

This whole time I told him, I fucking told him he is prepared to give EA more money and that he is a moron for doing so because they’ll pull the same shit they always do but he firmly believed Anthem would be the one, Anthem would be EA’s return, Anthem would be a good game.

And he purchased the most expensive preorder.

And now their servers are broken and I don’t know about you guys but there’s some popcorn in the microwave and I’m settling in for another round of lies, arrogance, micro transactions and all the good EA stuff we’ve come to know and love.

At E3 they said there’ll be no loot boxes and no ability to pay for power in Anthem.

So we’ll see how long it takes them to add in loot boxes and ability to pay for power.

So we’ll see how long it takes them to add in loot boxes and ability to pay for power.

blog.name: cyberpunk-thot
blog.title: Is NiCola ok Instead?
blog.description:
Dex || Gay || 25 || UK

Jackie Welles is my husband.

tags: a realistic city with more than two people walking down the street lol
summary: I'm definitely looking forward to the lively world. I do plan to regularly spend hours just wandering the city and watching the...
question: I'm definitely looking forward to the lively world. I do plan to regularly spend hours just wandering the city and watching the world's interactions with itself. It's been far too long since an open world rpg had an NPC population of "realistic proportionate to city size"
answer:
Ahh yes! I love a realistic city population. Like it’s a major city and people are living in those mega-buildings so of course there’s a high population.

I wonder how many people will have a set routine, like if you can follow them all day and they don’t do the same thing twice? I imagine there’s a whole lotta work going into the making of Night City. I’m excited!

Although I can’t help but picture that infamous scene from Heavy Rain. Now that’s a crowd simulation!

tags: like in DA and it says ‘XXX doesnr approve’ i ran and shut down my ps3 so quick! like nty
summary: I'm very excited at the possibility of missions affecting other missions down the line. So killing somebody in mission A might...
question: I'm very excited at the possibility of missions affecting other missions down the line. So killing somebody in mission A might screw you over in mission D.
answer:
Ahh yes! I love this possibility. Like killing a person in mission A makes mission C super difficult/ easy. I imagine there are moments where a character will say something after a particular event and it’s a subtle hint towards a future mission?

You bet that I’ll rush and turn off my console before it auto saves if I made the wrong choice lol!
